nodes.text: Uviuy Exen was an astronomical object located in the regions known as the Colonies and the Interior. It was also situated in the grid square L-9 of the Standard Galactic Grid. The super-hyperroute known as the Hydian Way linked Uviuy Exen to the Brentaal System in the Core Worlds as well as the Inner Rim world Champala. In addition, it was connected to Palanhi by the Shwuy Exchange hyperspace route.

Uviuy Exen was introduced in the current Star Wars canon in the fifty-second issue of Star Wars: Build the Millennium Falcon magazine, published around December 30, 2015. The planet Uviuy Exen was originally introduced in the Star Wars Legends continuity, where it was first mentioned in the 1989 Imperial Sourcebook, written by Greg Gorden and published by West End Games for Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game.
